abstract: After less than a day of deliberations, a federal jury found Doug Whitman of Whitman Capital in Menlo Park, Calif., guilty of earning about $1 million in illegal profits trading technology stocks, including Google and Polycom.
snippet: After less than a day of deliberations, a federal jury found Doug Whitman of Whitman Capital in Menlo Park, Calif., guilty of earning about $1 million in illegal profits trading technology stocks, including Google and Polycom.
lead_paragraph: A former California-based hedge fund manager who took the stand in his own defense was convicted of insider trading on Monday.

headline.main: Hedge Fund Manager Found Guilty of Insider Trading
